summary: This module implements a data‑access layer that interacts with the MongoDB database via Beanie models. It provides functions to create, read, update, and delete records for applications, variants, environments, templates, evaluations, images, users and related configurations, as well as utility helpers for fetching specific revisions and managing relationships between these entities.
business_intent: Enable the backend to persist and manage the lifecycle of AI application components—such as app definitions, variant configurations, deployment environments, evaluation scenarios, and template assets—so that the platform can store, retrieve, and modify these resources reliably.
